section.p:
Change password window
Change password window
Change password window will open in two cases:
After clicking on Change password link in Login window;
When adding or editing users in the Accounts management window (see )
section.note: All users must confirm their old password before changing it to a new one. Contact your system administrator if you forgot your password.
An indicator will appear in the window whenever the CapsLock key on your keyboard is active.
section.p: The color confirmation bar between New password and Confirm new password fields will stay orange as long as the contents of the two fields do not match. It will become green as soon as the match is achieved.
